comments.text:
Created attachment 8973047
use fallback for color glyphs with transparency in WR

Color glyphs (used by some emoji fonts) are rendered as many overlapping single color glyphs. With transparency, the result needs to be buffered before it can be blended with the final opacity. We currently can't handle this in WR.

For now, mark such text runs as unsupported so that they are handled by blob images instead.
